<font size = "6" color = "steelblue">__Objectives__</font>

By the end of this training, you should be able to:

* <font color = "grey">Master the use of RStudio interactive environment</font>

* <font color = "grey">Install R packages</font>

* <font color = "grey">Explore and understand how to use the R documents</font>

* <font color = "grey">Load data into R from various sources</font>

* <font color = "grey">Undertand different data types and data structures</font>

* <font color = "grey">Use the tidyverse packages to manipulate data frames</font>

* <font color = "grey">Understand how to create and manipulate dates</font>

* <font color = "grey">Create plots using ggplot2 </font>

* <font color = "steelblue">__Write user-defined functions__</font>

* <font color = "grey">Use control statements</font>

* <font color = "grey">Write loops</font>

* __Use apply family of functions to iterate funtions across data__

* __Reshape data__

* <font color = "grey">Join tables</font>

* <font color = "grey">Identify and deal with missing data</font>

* __Manipulate strings__

* __Conduct basic data analysis using R__
